snippet.title: Space War - (1979) - Arcade - gameplay
snippet.description:
Leijac Corp © 1979
[Coin-Op] Arcade Video Game
Emulator: MAME 0.215

Funny they say this is a "clone" of a 1980 game... play the future today!   Hey, I just plain like this game.  It's actually pretty much just like SPACE BEAM... head-to-head, you against a decent computer AI opponent.  Try to shoot down the minefield to clear a path, or strategically weave in and around for that perfect single-shot to take out your opponent.  You have to wait until your laser is charged up enough to make it across the battlefield, or you will certainly be on the short-end of the exchange!  Good sound effects, satisfying victory every time your laser connects!
